title: Access: experiment in Port Adelaide
brief_description: Patterned on the Canadian “Challenge for Change” experiments, this is an example of the video access concept at work for the Department of Social Security, helping to cut down the often mythical barriers between citizens and Government Departments involved in social welfare. No other credits available.
